title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: When using the Open Type dialog, the obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are prominently displayed.
EB: The obfuscated classes should not be displayed in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
Options:

a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.

b) Completely filter out the obfuscated classes.

I suggest to implement option a).
